p: Since 2014, Bahia state and specially FS have reported a large number of positive cases for CHIKV infection. Released data from the Brazilian surveillance health system (SINAN) indicates that Bahia state reported a total of 50,880 cases of chikungunya fever in 2016 and 1,524 chikungunya cases, until the 2019 25 th epidemiological week (June/2019). In the same period FS reported more than 300 cases per 100 thousand habitants [ 9â€“ 10].
